this_title: The World According to Dick Cheney
trans_title: 迪克切尼 眼中的世界
introduction: For better or for worse, Vice President Dick Cheney was the last decade’s most influential American politician. And yet, he remains cloaked in mystery. Cheney’s political brand was dedicated to re-establishing the executive authority, privilege, and secrecy endemic to the pre-Watergate era. In short, we don’t know Dick. This exhaustive treatment of Cheney’s career sheds much-ne...
chinese_title: 迪克切尼 眼中的世界
foreign_title: The World According to Dick Cheney
